song.englishname: It's A Great Day To Be Alive

english.segment1: I got rice cooking in the microwave. Got a three day beard I don't plan to shave. And it's a goofy thing but I just gotta say. Hey I'm doing alright
english.segment2: Yeah I think I'll make me some homemade soup. Feelin pretty good and that's the truth. It's neither drink nor drug induced. No I'm just doin alright
english.segment3: And it's a great day to be alive. I know the sun's still shinin when I close my eyes. There's some hard times in the neigborhood. But why can't every day be just this good?
english.segment4: It's been fifteen years since I left home. Said good luck to every seed I'd sown. Give it my best and then I left it alone. Oh..I hope their doin alright
english.segment5: Now I look in the mirror and what do I see?. A lone wolf there starin back at me. Long in the tooth but harmless as can be. Lord I guess he's doin alright
english.segment6: And it's a great day to be alive. I know the sun's still shinin when I close my eyes. There's some hard times in the neigborhood. But why can't every day be just this good?
english.segment7: Sometimes it's lonely. Sometimes it's only me. And the shadows that fill this room. Sometimes I'm fallin. Desperately callin. Howlin at the moon.. Ahwoo!. Ahwoo!
english.segment8: Well I might go get me a new tattoo. Or take my old Harley for a three day cruise. Might even grow me a Fu Man Chu.. Oh Aww!
